generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance with cars driving on it.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible along both sides of the road, bordered by curbs and trees.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures with windows and storefronts.
- vegetation: Trees with green leaves are present along the sidewalks and street, providing shade.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: A person is visible standing on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- car: Numerous cars are parked along both sides of the road and some are in motion.
- truck: A yellow DHL truck is visible in the distance, driving in the opposite direction.
- traffic sign: A blue parking sign with a 'P' symbol is visible on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and utility poles.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible in the distance, hanging above the road.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible parked on the right side of the road.
